sentences: Chair Dovland introduced the documents (FCCC/KP/AWG/2009/INF.3; FCCC/KP/AWG/2009/MISC.4; and FCCC/KP/AWG/2008/8).
In their statements, some parties proposed focusing on the most vulnerable countries.
Others suggested focusing on developing countries at large.
Parties also addressed the need for more evidence of consequences and possible channels for communicating information on consequences.
enb_long_title: Fifth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action under the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (AWG-LCA 5) and Seventh session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG-KP 7)
